mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM lsblj_login_log where id IN (
#{item},
0)
mapper.select: SELECT FROM_UNIXTIME(lsblj_login_log.login_datetime) login_datetime,lsblj_login_log.* FROM lsblj_login_log ORDER BY login_datetime DESC

SELECT date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(login_datetime), "%w") day, count(*) ct FROM lsblj_login_log WHERE login_datetime>(UNIX_TIMESTAMP()-6*24*3600) GROUP BY date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(login_datetime),"%d") ORDER BY date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(login_datetime),"%w") ASC

SELECT date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(login_datetime), "%e") day, count(*) ct FROM lsblj_login_log WHERE login_datetime>(UNIX_TIMESTAMP()-29*24*3600) GROUP BY date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(login_datetime),"%d") ORDER BY date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(login_datetime),"%d") ASC
SELECT username, realname, count(*) ct FROM lsblj_login_log WHERE user_id IN(SELECT id FROM lsblj_user) GROUP BY username ORDER BY ct DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, realname, count(*) ct FROM lsblj_login_log WHERE user_id IN(SELECT id FROM lsblj_user) GROUP BY username ORDER BY ct DESC LIMIT 20
